title: nicknftenthu
author: nicknftenthu
content: Hello!I'm looking for a translator for translating crypto-related topics.Translator should have an experience in the same industry of translating texts from English to Russian and Ukrainian and Vice Versa. Working experience with Json files will be an advantage.Contact me through the comment section or DM.

comments.author: HONDACD125
comments.body: I recommend yo visit Below thread where you will find trusted translator with lot of crypto knowledge and already made so many translation https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5442314.0

comments.author: wwzsocki
comments.body: Quote from: nicknftenthu on October 30, 2023, 08:06:05 AMHello!I'm looking for a translator for translating crypto-related topics.Translator should have an experience in the same industry of translating texts from English to Russian and Ukrainian and Vice Versa. Working experience with Json files will be an advantage.Contact me through the comment section or DM.I can help let me know, here my thread with translation offerhttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5257557

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: HONDACD125 on October 30, 2023, 08:25:56 AMI recommend yo visit Below thread where you will find trusted translator with lot of crypto knowledge and already made so many translation https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5442314.0Thanks for the support HONDACD125, I'm glad to know that you like our work in the forum In the AoBT we are always ready to help. OP, you can ask me whenever you need a translation, or you can contact each or our native translators directly (in this specific case, our Russian translator is zasad@). If you prefer, wwzsocki also has a lot of experience and will carry out high quality work.Best,
